About the Game

Philana, a former noble, lives peacefully in the mountains with her childhood friend, Lily.

However, one day Philana finds Lily collapsed and weak.

Lily suffers from an illness for several years that has been getting worse.

The only cure for this illness is an experimental medicine, the Elixir of Life.

Being an alchemist herself, Lily was gathering the materials to create the medicine but her body has finally reached its limit.

Philana, heartbroken from the sight of Lily weak and ill, swears to find the necessary materials and leaves the house.

There are just two items she needs now. Although Lily claims that the final ingredients aren't all that valuable, Filana isn't the only person who's out looking for them...

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Skill System
  • Multiple Difficulties
    • [/list]

data.short_description: A classic style turn-based RPG. Philana is on a journey to find the final ingredients for the Elixir of Life, the only medicine that can save her friend's life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
